description:
Our client is a leading organisation dedicated to simplifying the complexities of international mobility. They are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Operations Manager to oversee and optimise their global logistics and compliance operations. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where you will be instrumental in improving efficiency and productivity.

What You'll Do

  • Oversee and streamline global logistics operations to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery of services.
  • Develop and implement logistics strategies to optimise supply chain processes.
  • Coordinate with international partners, vendors, and service providers to ensure seamless operations.
  • Ensure compliance with international laws, regulations, and industry standards.
  • Develop and maintain policies and procedures to ensure regulatory adherence.
  • Lead, mentor, and develop a team of logistics and compliance staff.
  • Identify opportunities for process optimisation and implement best practices.
  • Ensure a seamless and positive experience for our clients and partners.
  • Develop and manage logistics and compliance budgets.

What You Bring

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Logistics, Supply Chain Management or related field.
  • Proven experience as an Operations Manager in global logistics and compliance.
  • Strong leadership skills with experience in team management.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities with analytical mindset.
  • Proficiency in using logistics software and tools.
  • Experience with SQL and Python.
  • Outstanding communication skills with ability to interact effectively at all levels.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
  • Knowledge of the immigration industry is desirable.

What Sets This Company Apart

This is an opportunity to join a mission-driven company that is transforming its industry landscape. The company fosters a collaborative and inclusive culture where everyone's contribution is valued. They offer opportunities for professional growth and development along with competitive benefits package.
